title: Auto-approve new user registrations and update success messaging

requirements.summary: Update registration success message to indicate immediate login availability
acceptanceCriteria: Success toast or message displays 'Registration Successful! You can now log in' after successful registration
No pending approval messaging is shown to the user
Message appears immediately after registration completes

file_operations.description: Update the success message after registration to display 'Registration Successful! You can now log in' instead of any pending approval messaging. Remove or update any toast notifications that reference pending approval status.

requirements.summary: Implement automatic redirect to login page after successful registration
acceptanceCriteria: After successful registration, user is automatically navigated to /login route
Redirect occurs after the success message is displayed
No manual navigation by user is required

file_operations.description: Add automatic navigation to /login route after successful registration. Use the router's navigate function to redirect users immediately after the success message is shown. Consider a brief delay (e.g., 1-2 seconds) to allow users to see the success message before redirecting.
